options.name: Severing Strikes
options.description: When you score a True Hit with a Melee Attack, your Target gains the Bleeding Condition.

options.name: Visceral Veteran
options.description: Gain +2 Psychic Mitigation and +1 Physical Mitigation

options.name: Anatomical Exploits
options.description: Gain +1 Damage to all Melee Weapons and +1 Medicine

options.name: The Art of Gore
options.description: You gain a +2 Attack Bonus when making a Melee Attack against a Creature with the Bleeding Condition.

options.name: Action : Bloodbath
options.description: You remove the Bleeding Condition from all other Creatures within a 2 Unit Radius of you. For each Condition removed, you gain 1d6 Temporary Health that lasts for 1 minute.

options.name: Action : Surgical Strike
options.description: You make a Melee Attack against a Creature that has the Bleeding Condition. If the attack hits, it is upgraded to a True Hit.

options.name: Reaction : Trauma Guard
options.description: In response to taking Damage, make a Medicine Check and reduce the total Damage by that amount.
